title: Please Let Me Dote On You, For A Fee
alternative_title: 溺愛させて下さい、有料で ; Dekiai Sasete Kudasai, Yuuryou de
status: 溺愛させて下さい、有料で ; Dekiai Sasete Kudasai, Yuuryou de
description:
Description :
        Junko was deceived by her lover, who she didn't know was married. Because of it, she loses her job as a teacher. Junko's mood doesn't clears up, even when she won 5 million in the lottery, and she becomes desperate...In that moment Haruto appears in front of her, a handsome mysterious young guy. "Would you like to spend your life with me for a fee?" Haruto's words were so comforting to Junko, who wanted someone to be kind to her, even if it meant paying for it. It was only for one night, but Junko, who was empty in both body and mind, drowned in Haruto's lip service. But Haruto, who said that he was working as a escort to pay for his tuition, seems to have known Junko for a long time...?
